projects.name: Progrex
projects.description: A Rust library for progressive tasks and scheduling.
tasks: Build task scheduling mechanisms
Ensure high performance and low latency
Support concurrent task processing
projects.details: Progrex is a high-performance library for task scheduling in Rust, designed to manage and execute tasks with minimum latency.

projects.name: LIMITER
projects.description: A rate limiting library for Node.js.
tasks: Implement rate limiting algorithms
Support multiple strategies (e.g., fixed window, sliding window)
Ensure scalability and performance
requirements: Handle large-scale rate limiting for APIs
Ensure compliance with rate limits in high-traffic environments
projects.details: LIMITER is a Node.js library designed to provide rate limiting capabilities for APIs to prevent overloading servers.

projects.name: SHORTIE
projects.description: A URL shortening service built using Rust.
tasks: Implement URL shortening mechanisms
Build a high-performance backend service
Ensure scalability and reliability
requirements: Support for large number of URLs
projects.details: SHORTIE is a Rust-based URL shortening service designed for high scalability and performance, ideal for applications that need to manage a large number of URLs.

projects.name: Anony-Memo
projects.description: An anonymous messaging service built using Node.js and Express.
tasks: Implement anonymous message sending and receiving
Ensure security and anonymity of users
Integrate with third-party services for authentication
projects.details: Anony-Memo is an anonymous messaging service that allows users to send and receive messages without revealing their identities.

projects.name: SKY-PULSE
projects.description: A space station simulation built with Rust.
tasks: Create a simulation environment for a space station
Implement real-time data processing and control systems
Ensure scalability for multiple users
requirements: Support real-time simulation of space station systems
Integrate multiplayer functionality for user interactions
projects.details: SKY-PULSE is a space station simulation game built using Rust, focusing on real-time processing and multiplayer interactions.

projects.name: FINANS
projects.description: A finance management service built with Node.js.
tasks: Develop a finance tracking system
Implement secure authentication and authorization
Integrate with third-party APIs for financial data
projects.details: FINANS is a finance management service that helps users track their spending and manage their budget with real-time data.

projects.name: FILER
projects.description: A file management service built with Go.
tasks: Develop a file management system with robust APIs
Ensure secure file access and sharing
Support for large file uploads and versioning
projects.details: FILER is a Go-based file management service that offers secure file sharing, storage, and versioning.

projects.name: Heath-ISH
projects.description: A health service API built using Node.js.
tasks: Build an API for health data tracking
Ensure HIPAA compliance for medical data
Integrate with health data sources
requirements: Secure storage and transmission of health data
projects.details: Health-ISH is a health service API designed to track and manage health-related data with compliance to healthcare standards.

projects.name: FORMERA
projects.description: A form builder API built with Node.js.
tasks: Develop a dynamic form builder API
Support form validation and user input handling
Ensure scalability for large form collections
projects.details: FORMERA is a form builder API that allows users to create and manage dynamic forms with custom validation rules.

projects.name: DELIVA-PRO
tasks: Build and manage logistics workflows
Integrate shipment tracking and management
Develop user interfaces and backend services
projects.details: DELIVA-PRO is a logistics web service designed for managing shipment and delivery tracking for businesses.

projects.name: COHI
projects.description: The official website of the Council of Higher Institutions.
tasks: Design the official website for the council
Develop responsive layouts and interactive features
Integrate user registration and event management
requirements: Support for multiple users and members
projects.details: COHI is the official website for the Council of Higher Institutions, providing information, events, and resources for students and institutions.

projects.name: TWS
projects.description: The official website of the WordsMith Debate Council.
tasks: Build a website for a debate council
Design event schedules, team member pages, and registration features
Implement discussion forums and member login
requirements: Support for event management and registration
Ensure smooth user experience for debate participants
projects.details: TWS is the official website of the WordsMith Debate Council, providing updates on events, discussions, and team details.

projects.name: NABOS
projects.description: The official website of the National Association of Botany Students, UNILAG.
tasks: Design the official website for botany students association
Develop member and event management systems
Implement resources and articles for botany students
requirements: Enable easy access to academic and event information
projects.details: NABOS is the official website of the National Association of Botany Students at UNILAG, providing resources and event information for members.

projects.name: Quiz-API
projects.description: A backend API for a quiz application.
tasks: Develop an API for quiz management
Support real-time quizzes and results tracking
Integrate user authentication for quiz participation
requirements: Ensure scalability for large quiz databases
Secure user data and quiz results
projects.details: Quiz-API is a backend API that supports quiz management, real-time results tracking, and user participation.
